Joseph Tom, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya JT the Bigga Figga (nke a makwaara dị ka Figg Panamera), bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na'emepụta ihe nkiri na onye isi ndekọ si n'ógbè Fillmore nke San Francisco, California.  O mepụtara egwu na ihe karịrị otu narị abọm, màkà ndị na-ese ihe gụnyere Daz Dillinger, Master P, The Game, San Quinn, na Messy Marv.
N'afọ 1991, JT guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ onwé ya Get Low Recordz Ihe malitere dị ka ụlọ ọrụ dị n'okpuru ala na ọrụ otu onye, ga-emesị bụrụ otu n'ime akara ndị nweere onwé ha na-aga nke ọma na mba ahụ.
JT rap mbụ bịara na 1992 na abọm nke onwe ya Don't Stop til We Major mgbè ọ dị afọ 18
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ sochiri ya na Playaz N the Game.  Otu egwu mbụ nke abọm ahụ, "Game Recognize Game" nwetara ikuku dị ịrịba ama, na-eme ka JT banye n'ìhè

Ihe ịga nke ọma nkè abọm ya dugara n'agha n'etiti ndị na-edekọ egwu, o mechara bịanye aka na Priority Records na 1995.  Abọm ndị sochirinụ wepụtara site na Priority Records enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, Otú ọ dị, na 1996 akara ahụ họpụtara ịtọhapụ JT site na nkwekọrịta ya.
Mgbè nkwekọrịta ya na Priority Records gbasara, JT laghachiri na-ekesa abọm ya site na Get Low Recordz
Site na ego sitere na nkwekọrịta ya na Priority, JT tinyere ego na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nka ọhụrụ wee malite imepụta ma wepụta ọtụtụ abọm ngwá ngwá
N'afọ 2000, mgbe ha bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkesa dị ala na Bayside Records, Get Low malitere ịgbasawanye, na-ewepụta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ abọm 20 n'afọ.
